moves.1. e4: This is a game from my first mini-tournament.
moves.5. h3 Bxf3 6. gxf3 Nf6: Perhaps he should have taken the d-pawn.
moves.10... Nf5 11. Qe4+: "Aha!" I thought. "I'll get his Knight!" Then, I noticed
moves.11... Ne7: Then it hit me! A brilliant combo was staring me in the face! Can you find the crucial first move?
moves.12. Bb5+:
Bb5+!! Did you find it? My opponent resigned here because 12. ...c6 13.dxc6 bxc6 14.Bxc6+ Qd7 15.Bxc7+, or 12...Qd7 and he saves some pawns.

Thank you for reading! Please R&C!
